General.Name: Jin Yang Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd
General.Description: Jin Yang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. engages in the pharmaceutical business in South Korea. The company offers products for anti-diabetics, antivirals, anti-hypertensives, anti-coagulants, antihistamines, antipyretics, and analgesics; digestive, respiratory, and neuropsychiatric system. It also provides drugs for genito-urinary system, anti-osteoporosis drugs, antimicrobials and antibiotics; and over the counter drugs antipyretics and analgesics. It also provides products for digestive, genito-urinary, neuropsychiatric, circulatory, and dermatological system. In addition, the company offers products for muscle relaxants, anti-hyperlipidemics, multivitamins and nutritionals, hepatics, anti-anemics, anti-obesity drugs, dental care drugs, and ophthalmic drugs. Jin Yang Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1971 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
